title: Paths of Love
description: These singles have crossed paths in the past, but only now are they taking a shot at love. It’s the only show where you get a second chance at a chance meeting.
quote: It’s as if he’s trying to say all the wrong things.
creator: Jay Gianukos
altHero: woman stands in front of rows of men in a heart ceremony
alt1: woman bachelorette looks nervous but excited
alt3: Shawn and Gus, contestants on the show, each give a one finger wave
alt4: the bachelorette with the man she chooses, rose petals cascading down around them
